body:
Hi,
I want to generate a Tregenza patched sky model that distributes the sun contribution into one of this patches instead of considering it separately from the sky dome. I know I am supposed to use rtcontrib but i am not sure I understand how it works. Maybe someone can help me here.
Regards,
Ale
